sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The GSview package contains epstool , gsview and gsview-help.

sect3.title: epstool
sect3.para: epstool is a tool for extracting preview bitmaps in EPS files.

sect3.title: gsview
sect3.para: gsview is a viewer for PostScript (PS) and PDF files.

sect3.title: gsview-help
sect3.para: gsview-help is a script for displaying help files in your chosen browser.
